list-item.p: •NC: normal control rats administered 1 mL/kg bwt (i.p.) of 0.1 M citrate buffer (pH 4.5)
•STZ+ACA: diabetic rats treated with 25 mg of acarbose/kg bwt
•STZ+PBE: diabetic rats orally treated with 200 mg/ kg bwt of PBE
•STZ+HPBE: diabetic rats treated with 200 mg/kg bwt PBE and 10% honey
•STZ+CHPBE-1: diabetic rats treated with HPBE and 1% cocoa powder
•STZ+CHPBE-2: diabetic rats treated with HPBE and 2% cocoa powder
